title: Amazon Prime: FREE Workout Videos (Kickboxing, Pilates, Total Body & More)
text:
Amazon Prime Members ! Looking to get fit this year? Hop on over to Amazon Instant Video where Prime Members only can score select Workout Videos for free ! Here are just a few of the deals I spotted…
15 Minute Full Body Workout – Exercises to Tone and Lose Weight 
FREE for Prime Members 
Fitness for Beginners – Daniel Aldridge 
FREE for Prime Members 
Fitness Kickboxing Workout 
FREE for Prime Members 
High Energy Full-Body Cardio Pilates Fitness Fusion Workout 
FREE for Prime Members 
…and Much MORE ! Not a Prime Member? You can sign up for a FREE 30-day trial here ! (Thanks, Shop The Hot Deals !)
